TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit FirstMatchCodeGroup extends System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup
Public NotInheritable Class FirstMatchCodeGroup Inherits CodeGroup
public ref class FirstMatchCodeGroup sealed : System::Security::Policy::CodeGroup

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This type is obsolete and will be removed in a future release of the .NET Framework. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=155570 for more information.")
System.Obsolete("This type is obsolete. See http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=155570 for more information.")

summary.span: 允许由代码组的策略声明和第一个匹配的子代码组的策略声明的联合来定义安全策略。

span.span: Allows security policy to be defined by the union of the policy statement of a code group and that of the first child code group that matches.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 代码组是构建基块的代码访问安全性策略。Code groups are the building blocks of code access security policy. 每个策略级别包含可以有子代码组的根代码组。Each policy level consists of a root code group that can have child code groups. 每个子代码组可以具有其自己的子代码组;此行为将扩展到任意数量的级别，从而形成一个树。Each child code group can have their own child code groups; this behavior extends to any number of levels, forming a tree. 每个代码组有一个确定根据该程序集的证据是否属于给定的程序集的成员资格条件。Each code group has a membership condition that determines if a given assembly belongs to it based on the evidence for that assembly. 其成员资格条件匹配给定的程序集的唯一代码组和它们的子代码组应用策略。Only code groups whose membership conditions match a given assembly and their child code groups apply policy. 喜欢的任何代码组，仅适用于其成员资格条件匹配的程序集的证据。Like any code group, only applies when its membership condition matches evidence for an assembly. 如果没有匹配项，它按顺序，在出现第一个匹配项时停止测试每个子级的成员资格条件。If there is a match, it tests the membership condition of each child in order, stopping when the first match occurs. 结果是根代码组的策略声明和匹配该代码组的第一个子组的策略声明的联合。The result of is the union of the policy statement of the root code group and the policy statement of the first child group of that code group that matches. 被供以编程方式使用应用程序域主机以将域策略设置。 is intended for programmatic use by application domain hosts to set domain policy. ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用的成员类。The following example shows the use of members of the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#1)]

param.name: membershipCondition
param.span: 成员条件，它测试证据以确定此代码组是否应用策略。

span.span: A membership condition that tests evidence to determine whether this code group applies policy.

param.name: policy
param.span: 形式为权限集和特性的代码组的策略声明，这些权限集和特性将被授予匹配成员条件的代码。

span.span: The policy statement for the code group in the form of a permission set and attributes to grant code that matches the membership condition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数创建一个基本代码组，并且应从自定义代码组的构造函数调用。This constructor creates a basic code group and should be called from the constructors of custom code groups. 可以使用添加子代码组方法。Child code groups can be added using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用构造函数。The following code shows the use of the constructor. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for class. summary.span: 生成代码组的深层副本。

span.span: Makes a deep copy of the code group.

returns.span: 代码组（包括其成员条件和子代码组）的等效副本。

span.span: An equivalent copy of the code group, including its membership conditions and child code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法也生成的代码组，这意味着，它包含的所有对象的副本进行的深层副本。This method makes a deep copy of the code group, meaning that copies of all objects it contains are made, as well. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法，使代码组的深层副本。The following code shows the use of method to make a deep copy of the code group. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for class. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.PolicyStatement Resolve(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.

summary.span: 对一组证据解析代码组及其子代的策略。

span.span: Resolves policy for the code group and its descendants for a set of evidence.

returns.span: 由具有可选特性的代码组授予的权限组成的策略声明；或者，如果代码组不适用（成员条件与指定的证据不匹配），则为 。

span.span: A policy statement consisting of the permissions granted by the code group with optional attributes, or if the code group does not apply (the membership condition does not match the specified evidence).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将给定的加载程序集的证据，通过先检查针对指定的证据的成员资格条件评估代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果没有匹配项，则此方法返回的代码组，其中包括评估的子代码组的策略语句。If there is a match, this method returns a policy statement for the code group, including evaluation of child code groups. 对于第一个匹配代码组，每个子代码组的成员身份条件是针对在其中添加它们; 顺序证据进行测试只有第一个匹配项将被解析的证据集。For first-match code groups, each child code group's membership condition is tested against the evidence in the order in which they were added; only the first match is resolved with the evidence set. 如果没有任何匹配项，将应用父第一个匹配代码组的策略语句。If there are no matches, the policy statement of the parent first-match code group applies. 匹配的子代码组类型确定如何应用其下的所有子组，具体取决于如何这些子组的方法的工作原理。The matching child code group type determines how all child groups under it are applied, depending on how the methods of these child groups work. .NET Framework 安全系统使用上的策略级别来确定加载的代码从生成的策略语句和代码授予哪些权限请求的程序集。The .NET Framework security system uses on the policy levels to determine which permissions to grant to loaded code from the resulting policy statements and the code request on the assembly. 此方法的此操作是按如下所示：This operation of this method is as follows: 如果成员资格条件与指定的证据不匹配，则返回`null`; 否则为设置要返回 (P) 的权限集等于代码组的策略语句并继续。If the membership condition does not match the specified evidence, return `null`; otherwise, set the permission set to be returned (P) equal to the code group's policy statement and continue. 对于每个子代码组，解析代码组具有相同的证据;如果结果不为`null`，返回该策略语句。For each child code group, resolve the code group with the same evidence; if the result is not `null`, return that policy statement. 如果没有子代码组匹配，则返回 P （父级的策略语句）。If no child code group matched, return P (the parent's policy statement). ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法来解析代码组的策略。The following code shows the use of the method to resolve policy for the code group. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#19)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#19)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.Policy.CodeGroup ResolveMatchingCodeGroups(class System.Security.Policy.Evidence evidence) cil managed

span.span: The evidence for the assembly.
Resolves matching code groups.

returns.span: 一个 ，它是匹配代码组的树的根。

span.span: A that is the root of the tree of matching code groups.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将给定的加载程序集的证据，通过先检查针对指定的证据的成员资格条件评估代码组。Given evidence for an assembly to be loaded, this method evaluates the code group by first checking the membership condition against the specified evidence. 如果没有匹配项，则此方法返回的根代码组。If there is a match, this method returns a root code group. 返回的代码组包含子代码组，因而也就可以有根据需要以反映所提供的证据匹配的代码组的完整集合的子代码组。The code group that is returned contains child code groups, which in turn can have child code groups as necessary to reflect the complete set of code groups that were matched by the evidence provided. 对于第一个匹配代码组，每个子代码组的成员身份条件是针对在其中添加它们; 顺序证据进行测试只有第一个匹配项将被解析的证据集。For first-match code groups, each child code group's membership condition is tested against the evidence in the order in which they were added; only the first match is resolved with the evidence set. 如果没有任何匹配项，将应用父第一个匹配代码组的策略语句。If there are no matches, the policy statement of the parent first-match code group applies. 匹配的子代码组类型确定如何应用其下的所有子组，具体取决于如何这些子组的方法的工作原理。The matching child code group type determines how all child groups under it are applied, depending on how the methods of these child groups work. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法来解析匹配的代码组。The following code shows the use of the method to resolve matching code groups. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CPP/members.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/CS/members.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Policy.FirstMatchCodeGroup_Evt/VB/Form1.vb#9)]
